description:
Power On and Off WebOS LG TVs together with your PC.

This application (UI and service) controls LG WebOS TVs and displays.
This is a hotfix release with a fix for the service crashing on startup on the ARM64 build. Thanks @plexecutor for your help in debugging the issue!
New features in v5:
- Automatic version updater, including a fully silent mode
- Option to select network adapter for sending Wake-On-Lan packets (configured per device)
- User Idle Mode (screen blanking) is much improved with detailed process control and detection of video playing in browser
Bugfixes and improvements
- Critical fix for potential deadlock when resuming the system
- Updated installer, including allowing x64 install on ARM64 machines
- Taskbar pinning and application icon fix
- Further reduced memory- and CPU usage
- PS5 DualSense optimisations for User Idle Mode
- Elevated user-mode process (daemon) with the help of the task scheduler
